name: scl-marketplace
description: SanctionedCodeList plugin marketplace - aggregates law tools, writing, office automation, and document processing skills

plugins.name: law-tools
plugins.description: Legal research toolkit with USPTO, court, SEC, and regulatory data connectors plus document drafting capabilities for memos, briefs, reports, and contracts.

plugins.name: writing
plugins.description: Comprehensive writing guidance for professional documents. Provides style guides, cognitive fluency techniques, structure frameworks, and revision checklists for legal, academic, executive, and business writing.

plugins.name: office-bridge
plugins.description: Microsoft Office automation via Office.js add-ins. Create, edit, and manipulate Word, Excel, and PowerPoint documents through a bridge server.

plugins.name: python-docx-redline
plugins.description: Document creation, editing, and analysis with tracked changes support. Work with .docx files including redlining, comments, and CriticMarkup workflows.
